Name: 五代十国之玉知
About the game: This is a pure literature game talk about Madness,base on the craziest history from China,the Five Periods and Ten Kingdoms. You will act as a king,or a military commander,or a politician in this game. But no matter how,you may be shocked by the experience because of their madness. [GAMEPLAY] Just read story and make a choice,that's all. [FEATURES] *ANCIENT PAINTING The game's background just are the paintings from the Five Periods and Ten Kingdoms. They are all very beautiful. *CRAZY STORY I can promise,the story will beyond over your every imagination. *ABUNDANT CHOICE Player can make many choices to determine character's fate in this game. [CONTENT] You are a little girl who lost family but forced to marry a bad boy,you hate your life and the world but you need to struggle with everything you hate. Remember,your every choice will influence over politic.
